text: -  Kaposiform hemangioendothelioma and tufted angioma.              Intermediate (rarely metastasizing) tumors    Intermediate (rarely metastasizing) tumors sometimes spread to other parts of the body. This summary has information about the following vascular tumors that rarely metastasize:            -  Retiform hemangioendothelioma.     -  Papillary intralymphatic angioendothelioma.     -  Composite hemangioendothelioma.     -  Kaposi sarcoma.
